Movies.title: The Bad Guys
Movies.description: After a lifetime of pulling legendary heists, five notorious bad guys--Mr. Wolf, Mr. Snake, Mr. Piranha, Mr. Shark and Ms. Tarantula--attempt their most challenging job yet...going good. Nobody has ever failed so hard at trying to be good as The Bad Guys, an all-new animated feature film from DreamWorks Animation.

Movies.title: Sonic The Hedgehog2
Movies.description: The world's favorite blue hedgehog is back for a next-level adventure in SONIC THE HEDGEHOG 2. After settling in Green Hills, Sonic is eager to prove he has what it takes to be a true hero. His test

Movies.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
Movies.description: For the first time in the cinematic history of Spider-Man, our friendly neighborhood hero's identity is revealed, bringing his Super Hero responsibilities into conflict with his normal life and putting those he cares about most at risk. When he enlists Doctor Strange's help to restore his secret, the spell tears a hole in their world, releasing the most powerful villains who've ever fought a Spider-Man in any universe. Now, Peter will have to overcome his greatest challenge yet, which will not only forever alter his own future but the future of the Multiverse.

Movies.title: Independance Day
Movies.description: AWhen extraterrestrials arrive on Earth and threaten to wipe out the human race, it's up to a handful of survivors - armed only with inferior technology, wits and courage - to stop them.

Movies.title: Minions
Movies.description: Three unlikely heroes -- Kevin, Stuart, and Bob -- embark on a journey to find a new despicable leader for their tribe and save all of Minionkind... from annihilation.

Movies.title: Everything Everywhere all at Once

TVs.title: Yellowstone: Season 4
TVs.description: Amid shifting alliances, unsolved murders, open wounds, and hard-earned respect, Dutton family patriarch John Dutton (Kevin Costner) is determined to protect his ranch and his family's legacy by any means necessary.

TVs.title: The Big Bang Theory: Season 1
TVs.description: Leonard and Sheldon are brilliant physicists. But none of that genius helps them interact with people, especially women. All this begins to change when a free-spirited beauty named Penny moves in next door.
